conditions-list: bleed, blinded, cowering, dazed, dazzled, dead, deafened, disabled, drowning, dying, energy-drained, entangled, exhausted, fascinated, fatigued, flat-footed, grappled, helpless, incorporeal, invisible, nauseated, paralyzed, petrified, pinned, prone, fear-any, sickened, stable, staggered, stunned, suffocating, unconscious
100-at-level-1: Use max hp for first level/HD
100-at-level-1-title: Use max hit points for first level. Racial hit dice are considered 'first' if character has both racial and class hit dice.
ability-basis-desc: DC Ability basis: usually CHA for spellcasting ability, CON for poison, breathweapon, or other damage abilities
ability-damage-desc: За каждые 2 пункта урона, полученных одной характеристикой, вы получаете штраф -1 к навыкам и параметрам, зависящим от соответствующей характеристики. Если количество полученного урона характеристике равно или превышает её значение, вы немедленно теряете сознание.
ability-drain-desc: Потеря характеристик уменьшает фактическое их значение. Измените все навыки и параметры, зависящие от соответствующей характеристики. Это может привести к потере пунктов навыков, пунктов здоровья и других бонусов.
ability-notes-place: Put notes about context-sensitive Ability bonuses here
ability-penalty-desc: Penalties function just like ability damage, but they cannot cause you to fall unconscious or die. Penalties cannot decrease your ability score to less than 1.
ability-type-title: Выберите тип способности, если есть. Экс (Экстраординарная), Пс (Псевдозаклинание), или Св (Сверхъестественная).
add-note-to-roll-desc: Для добавления текста примечания внизу броска выберите тип броска. Используется для обусловленных модификаторов.
additional-damage-title: Add additional, precision, or extra critical damage
additional-modifier-or-macro: Additional modifier or macro, e.g. [[1d6]], [[2d20k1]], etc.
all-features-desc: Features list contains Special Abilities, Special Qualities, Feats, etc
all-other-desc: Miscellaneous includes any not found under another tab
all-saves-macro-title: @{all_saves-macro} | Only affects the All Saves roll from the Defenses Menu button.
always-show-domain-spells: Всегда показывать заклинания сфер в меню списка заклинаний
armor-notes-place: Оставьте примечания об обусловленных бонусах к КБ
armor-shield-bonus: Armor or Shield bonus to Armor Class
attack-notes-place: Оставьте примечания об обусловленных бонусах к атакам
attacks-dmg-migrated-title: Repeating Attack damage multiplier migrated. Cannot remigrate.
attacks-migrated-title: Repeating Attack macros migrated. If an attack rolltemplate does not appear correct, delete the macro text and click into another field, the system will reset the macro text to defaults. Repeat for iterative attacks macros.
base-statistics-place: If the creature has buffs and other effects active that modify his stats, the base stats should be quickly summarized here.
before-combat-place: List any spells and/or abilities used before combat. His stats should reflect these spells.
bonus-or-penalty: The bonus or penalty to apply
bonus-type-title: Type of bonus for stacking purposes. Treat armor, shield, natural armor as bonuses (on bonus dropdown), not 'type' of bonus to AC.
buff-ability-checks-title: Бонус к проверкам характеристик и инициативе
buff-ability-skill-checks: Bonus to Ability & Skill Checks and Initiative
buff-aid-note: +@{b2_val} morale bonus on saving throws against fear effects.
buff-air-barrier-note: At 13th level, this barrier causes incoming arrows, rays, and other ranged attacks requiring an attack roll against her to suffer a 50% miss chance.
buff-archons-aura-note: lasts until it successfully hits caster with an attack
buff-armor-class-title: Бонус к классу брони и ЗБМ
buff-bane-note: @{b2_val} penalty on saving throws against fear effects.
buff-battle-ward-note: The next time a foe makes an attack roll against the target, the ward activates and grants a @{b1_val} deflection bonus to the warded creature's AC. Each subsequent time the warded creature is attacked, the defection bonus decreases by 1.
buff-bless-note: +@{b2_val} morale bonus on saving throws against fear effects.
buff-blessing-of-fervor-note: Pick speed bonus by checking buff 4, or Attack/AC/Reflex bonus, or other bonuses per round.
buff-charisma-penalty-title: Penalty to charisma. For every 2 points of damage you take, apply a –1 penalty to skills and statistics
buff-combat-expertise-note: Bonus to AC. Penalty to Melee attacks
buff-consecrate-note: Channel energy DCs increase by 3. Double this and all penalties if alter present.
buff-constitution-penalty-title: Penalty to constitution. For every 2 points of damage you take, apply a –1 penalty to skills and statistics
buff-curse-note: You must enable/disable -6 to any ability, or -4 to Attacks/Saves/Checks, or uncheck all for 50% chance to act normally curse.
buff-deadly-aim-note: Bonus to ranged damage. Penalty to ranged attack
buff-desecrate-note: +3 to save vs channel energy. Double all bonuses if alter present.
buff-dexterity-penalty-title: Penalty to dexterity. For every 2 points of damage you take, apply a –1 penalty to skills and statistics
buff-elemental-overflow-note: chance to ignore the effects of a critical hit or sneak attack
buff-enlarge-person-note: Досягаемость увеличена, рост х2, масса х4
buff-haste-note: При совершении полной атаки ускоренное существо может совершить одну дополнительную атаку одним искуственным или естественным оружием. Все способы движения ускоряются.
buff-inspire-courage-note: +@{b2_val} morale bonus on saving throws against charm and fear effects.
buff-inspired-rage-note: **Inspired Rage**, allies other than the skald cannot use any Charisma-, Dexterity-, or Intelligence-based skills (except Acrobatics, Fly, Intimidate, and Ride) or any ability that requires patience or concentration.
buff-intelligence-penalty-title: Penalty to intelligence. For every 2 points of damage you take, apply a –1 penalty to skills and statistics
buff-magearmor-note: made of force, incorporeal creatures can't bypass it the way they do normal armor.
buff-melee-title: Bonus to all melee attack rolls.
buff-melee2-title: Bonus to 'Alt Melee' attack rolls only
buff-natural-title: Усиление бонуса естественной брони к КБ
buff-power-attack-damage-title: Bonus to Melee damage. Damage multiplier is handled per Attack.
buff-power-attack-note: Bonus to Melee damage. Penalty to Melee attack
buff-rage-note: A barbarian cannot use any Charisma-, Dexterity-, or Intelligence-based skills (except Acrobatics, Fly, Intimidate, and Ride) or any ability that requires patience or concentration.
buff-ranged-title: Bonus to all ranged attack rolls.
buff-ranged2-title: Bonus to 'Alt Ranged' attack rolls only
buff-shield-note: Negates magic missile attacks directed at you. This bonus applies against incorporeal touch attacks, since it is a force effect.
buff-stardust-note: @{b1_val} penalty to sight based perception checks
buff-strength-penalty-title: Penalty to strength. For every 2 points of damage you take, apply a –1 penalty to skills and statistics
buff-touch-title: Bonus to touch attack armor class.
buff-type-title: Tab this row will appear under. Categorize buffs for user convenience.
buff-ward-note: Lasts until the warded creature is hit or fails a saving throw
buff-wisdom-penalty-title: Penalty to wisdom. For every 2 points of damage you take, apply a –1 penalty to skills and statistics
buffs-conditions-edit-section: Установка и редактирование бонусов и состояний
buffs-migrated-title: Buffs migrated to Buffs repeating section. Cannot be remigrated.
buffs-showsect-cmd: Нажмите, чтобы раскрыть область редактирования бонусов
carried-currency-title: Число монет, носимых персонажем, прибавляемых к общей нагрузке
cast-defensive-bonus: Бонус к концентрации при оборонительном сотворении
caster-level-basis-explanation: Race/class basis defaults to total character level
character-import-desc:
Hero Lab XML Import

Used to import characters from Hero Lab via XML files
Method #1(preferred)
Step 1: Download and install Leigh M.'s Hero Lab Pathfinder Exporter plug-in for Hero Lab (Use link below. To install you must double-click the .hl file while Hero Lab is NOT running). Note: there have been reports of this plug-in causing the Mac OS X version of Hero Lab to crash when attempting to save using it; if you experience this, you will have to use the second method.
Step 2: From Hero Lab, open the File menu and choose 'Save Custom Output'.
Step 3: Select 'Roll20 Pathfinder' and 'Current Hero Only', then click Output.
Step 4: Open the HTM file in a plain-text editor such as Notepad or Notepad++ and copy the entire contents.
Step 5: Paste the JSON into the text field directly below these instructions
Step 6: Click outside of the textarea to parse. If the import was successful, the textarea will clear with no errors.
Method #2
Step 1: Save the character as an XML file in Hero Lab (File -> Save Custom Output)
Step 2: Open the XML file in a plain-text editor. Copy and paste the contents into www.ConvertJSON.com (XML to JSON converter linked below). Paste into the left window labeled 'Xml Data', click 'Convert XML to JSON' to convert the the XML file to JSON, then copy the text from the right window.
Step 3: Paste the JSON into the text field directly below these instructions
Step 4: Click outside of the textarea to parse. If the import was successful, the textarea will clear with no errors.
charisma-penalized-title: Charisma Penalized. Penalties to ability scores only change the modifier, not the score itself. For every 2 points of damage or penalty you take to an ability, apply a –1 penalty to relevant skills and statistics.
class skill-bonus|armor-check-penalty|si: Class Skill Bonus / Armor check penalty / Size mod / Condition penalty
class-number-explanation: Номер класса, этот номер используется в выпадающих списках при выборе класса (нельзя сделать выбор по имени)
combat-effects-migrated-title: Attack and damage effects migrated to Buffs. Cannot be remigrated.
combat-maneuver-bonus-notes-place: Оставьте примечания об обусловленных бонусах к МБМ
combat-maneuver-defense-notes-place: Оставьте примечания об обусловленных бонусах к ЗБМ
combat-maneuver-notes-place: Оставьте примечания об обусловленных бонусах к ЗБМ
compendium-drag-n-drop-desc: Drag items, spells, etc from the compendium to an empty row below to auto populate the information. Compendium is at the italic i icon above the chat.
concentration-bonus-desc: Bonus to concentration rolls = caster level plus ability score
condition-bleed-title: Существо получает указанный урон в начале своего хода. Останавливается проверкой Лечения СЛ 15 или заклинанием, исцеляющим урон ПЗ.
condition-blinded-note: Штраф -4 ко встречным проверкам Внимания. Все проверки и действия, зависящие от видимости (такие как чтение и проверки Внимания, основанные на зрении) автоматичеки проваливаются.
condition-blinded-speed: Слепые существа должны проходить проверку Акробатики СЛ 10 чтобы двигаться быстрее чем с половиной скорости.
condition-blinded-title: Штраф -2 к классу брони, потеря бонуса Ловкости к КБ (если есть), -4 к большинству навыков, основанных на Силе и Ловкости, и ко встречным проверкам Внимания. Все проверки и действия, зависящие от видимости (такие как чтение или проверки Внимания, основанные на зрении), автоматически проваливаются.
condition-cowering-title: Штраф -2 к классу брони и потеря бонуса Ловкости к нему
condition-dazed-title: Существо не может нормально действовать. Существо в ступоре не совершает действий, но не получает штрафа к КБ.
condition-dazzled-title: Штраф -1 к атакам и проверкам Внимания, основанным на зрении
condition-deafened-note: Штраф -4 ко встречным проверкам Внимания, автоматически проваливаются проверки Внимания, основанные на звуке
condition-deafened-spellonly: 20% шанс провала заклинания со словесным компонентом
condition-deafened-title: Штраф -4 к инициативе, -4 ко встречным проверкам Внимания, 20% шанс провала заклинаний со словесным компонентом
condition-description: Модификаторы от состояний, влияющих на этот бонус
condition-disabled-title: Едва живой персонаж может совершать одно сопутствующее или основное действие за раунд (но не оба и не действие полного хода, но он всё ещё может совершать быстрые, прерывающие и свободные действия). Он движется с половиной скорости. Совершение любого основнго действия (или других, требующих, по мнению ГМ, особых усилий, включая некоторые свободные действия, таких как сотворение быстрого заклинания) наносит 1 единицу урона после завершение действия.
condition-drowning-title: When the character finally fails her CON check, she begins to drown. In the first round, she falls unconscious (0 hp). In the following round, she drops to –1 hit points and is dying. In the third round, she drowns.
condition-dying-title: Существо при смерти не может действовать. На следующем ходу персонажа, после снижения пунктов здоровья до отрицательного значения (но не смертельного), и каждый ход после этого персонаж должен проходить проверку Выносливости СЛ 10 чтобы стабилизироваться. Персонаж получает штраф к этому броску, равный числу отрицательных ПЗ. Стабилизированному персонажу не нужно проходить эту проверку. Натуральные 20 в этой проверке считаются автоматическим успехом. Если персонаж проваливает эту проверку, он теряет 1 ПЗ. Если у существа при смерти число отрицательных ПЗ равно его значению Выносливости, оно погибает.
condition-energy-drained-title: Штраф -1 ко всем атакам, боевым манёврам, защите от боевых манёвров, испытаниям, проверкам навыков и характеристик. Также текущее и максимальное значения ПЗ снижаются на 5.
condition-entangled-title: Штраф -2 ко всем атакам и -4 к Ловкости, движение с половиной скорости, невозможно бежать или атаковать с разбега
condition-exhausted-title: Штраф -6 к Силе и Ловкости, движение с половиной скорости, невозможно бежать или атаковать с разбега
condition-fascinated-title: –4 penalty on skill checks made as reactions, such as Perception checks
condition-fatigued-title: Штраф -2 к Силе и Ловкости, невозможно бежать или атаковать с разбега
condition-fear-title: Штраф -2 к атакам, испытаниям, проверкам навыков и характеристик; если напуган, также должен убегать; если в панике, также должен выронить предметы из рук и убегать.
condition-flat-footed-title: Flat-Footed: loses DEX bonus to AC and CMD (if any) and cannot make attacks of opportunity, unless he has the Combat Reflexes feat or Uncanny Dodge class ability.
condition-grappled-cmb-note: **+**[[2]] to grapple or escape a grapple.
condition-grappled-invisible-note: If a grappled creature becomes invisible, through a spell or other ability, it gains a +2 circumstance bonus on its CMD to avoid being grappled
condition-grappled-spell-note: A character who attempts to cast a spell or use a spell-like ability must make a concentration check (DC 10 + grappler's CMB + spell level), or lose the spell.
condition-grappled-title: Штраф -2 ко всем атакам и -4 к Ловкости, невозможно передвигаться
condition-helpless-note: Melee attacks against a helpless target get a +4 bonus
condition-helpless-title: Ловкость равна 0 (ЛВК: -5), ближние атаки по беспомощной цели получают бонус +4
condition-incorporeal-title: Creatures with the incorporeal condition do not have a physical body. Incorporeal creatures are immune to all nonmagical attack forms. Incorporeal creatures take half damage (50%) from magic weapons, spells, spell-like effects, and supernatural effects. Incorporeal creatures take full damage from other incorporeal creatures and effects, as well as all force effects.
condition-nauseated-title: Мучимое тошнотой существо не может атаковать, сотворять заклинания, концентрироваться на заклинаниях или делать что-либо ещё, требующее сосредоточенности. Единственное, что может сделать такое существо - одно сопутствующее действие за ход.
condition-paralyzed-note: Helpless, but can take purely mental actions
condition-paralyzed-title: Effective Dexterity and Strength scores of 0 and is helpless, but can take purely mental actions
condition-petrified-title: A petrified character has been turned to stone and is considered unconscious.
condition-pinned-spell-note: A pinned creature can take verbal and mental actions, but cannot cast any spells that require a somatic or material component.
condition-pinned-title: Нельзя передвигаться, отменяется бонус Ловкости. Дополнительно штраф -4 к классу брони
condition-prone-note: Бонус +4 к классу брони против дистанционных атак, штраф -4 к КБ против ближних атак
condition-prone-title: Штраф -4 к ближним атакам, бонус +4 (ситуативный) к классу брони против дистанционных атак, но штраф -4 к КБ против ближних атак
condition-sickened-title: Штраф -2 к атакам, урону от оружия, испытаниям, проверкам навыков и характеристик
condition-stable-title: The character is no longer dying, but is still unconscious.
condition-staggered-title: A staggered creature may take a single move action or standard action each round (but not both, nor can he take full-round actions). A staggered creature can still take free, swift, and immediate actions. A creature with nonlethal damage exactly equal to its current hit points gains the staggered condition.
condition-stunned-title: Штраф -2 к классу брони и потеря бонуса Ловкости к КБ (если есть)
condition-suffocating-title: When the character fails one of these CON checks, she begins to suffocate. In the first round, she falls unconscious (0 hit points). In the following round, she drops to –1 hit points and is dying. In the third round, she suffocates.
condition-unconscious-title: Unconscious creatures are knocked out and helpless. Unconsciousness can result from having negative hit points (but not more than the creature’s CON score), or from nonlethal damage in excess of current hit points.
conditions-showsect-cmd: Нажмите, чтобы раскрыть область редактирования состояний
config-header-image-info: Header images are iconic images that appear in the header of roll templates. All macros on the sheet include {{header_image=image attriubute}}. Each roll template has a specific image attribute that works with the options below. i.e. The Spells roll template would use {{header_image=@{header_image-pf_spell}}} Attack images can be set from within each weapon's "Options" section. Hover over the template names below to learn the specific image attributes. You can substitute images for any roll template by using the URL column below or using the syntax {{header_image=[name](url)}}
config-roll-template-info1: Roll templates use a combination of predetermined HTML, CSS, and macro-text to format the output of macros. Roll templates included in the Pathfinder sheet: pf_spell, pf_attack, pf_defense, pf_generic, and pf_block
config-roll-template-info3: Below is a list of each roll template along with it's defined properties(keys). Keys can only be used once within a macro. A key that is not defined may still be included in the macro and will be displayed on a new row as determined by the roll template. i.e. {{foo=foo}} Property values may consist of text, attributes, in-line rolls, images, hyperlinks, etc., or any combination of such values.
config-roll-template-info4: Each has a @{toggle_accessible_flag} , this makes the following string appear or not: {{accessible=true}}. If accessible is set, then an alternate rolltemplate is used that does not uses divs or tables but only labels and spans, which some users may find easier to use. This can also be set globally by checking "use simple templates"
config-roll-template-info5: Use this syntax to customize output of rolls in the "macro-text" fields found on the sheet.
config-roll-template-pf_ability:
Ability Roll Template (pf_ability)
Used for all Abilities(Class Features, Feats, Traits, etc) 2 column format except for the "description" property
config-roll-template-pf_attack:
Attack Roll Template (pf_attack)
Used for attacks 2 column format except for the "description" property (note: @{macro_options} is used by the sheet to enable the toggling of notes related to attacks and contains the properties for @{melee_notes}, @{ranged_notes}, @{cmb_notes}, and @{attack_notes})
config-roll-template-pf_block:
Block Text Roll Template (pf_block)
Used for Inventory rolls Key/Property names are not shown in this template Best for long blocks of text
config-roll-template-pf_defense:
Defense Roll Template (pf_defense)
Used for Saving Throws (note: @{macro_options} is used by the sheet to enable the toggling of notes related to defense and contains the properties for @{dr_notes}, @{resistances_notes}, @{immunities_notes}, @{weaknesses_notes}, @{sr_notes}, @{armor_notes}, @{save_notes}, @{cmd_notes}, and @{defense-notes})
config-roll-template-pf_generic:
Generic Roll Template (pf_generic)
Used for Ability checks, Initiative, Spell Failure Check, Skill Checks, Concentration Check, Caster Level Check 2 column format, except for righttext_X(1-10), lefttext_X(1-10), and the description keys
config-roll-template-pf_spell:
Spell Roll Template (pf_spell)
Used for all spell-based sheet rolls Primarily formatted to emulate a typical spell stat-block (note: @{spell_options} is used by the sheet to enable the toggling of spell attributes and contains ALL pf_spell specific properties)
config-update-spell-macros-info1: This is a mapping of old spell ids to new spell ids for use in upgrading macros.
config-update-spell-macros-info2:
Click Modify for each spell level and WARNING: DELETE ALL the old spell lists to eliminate old redundant attributes and possibly speed up your sheet
						Once you delete the below you will not be able to re-migrate the spells
confirm-delete-class-feature: Confirm deletion of all Orig Class Features
confirm-delete-feat: Confirm deletion of all Orig Feats
confirm-delete-mythic-ability: Confirm deletion of all Mythic Abilities
confirm-delete-mythic-feat: Confirm deletion of all Mythic Feats
confirm-delete-race-trait: Confirm deletion of all Orig Racial Traits
confirm-delete-spell-like-abilities: Confirm deletion of all Orig Spell-like Abilities
confirm-delete-trait: Confirm deletion of all Orig Traits
constitution-penalized-title: Constitution Penalized. Penalties to ability scores only change the modifier, not the score itself. For every 2 points of damage or penalty you take to an ability, apply a –1 penalty to relevant skills and statistics.
consumable-charge: Consumable or Item with Charges or Uses
create-attack-entry: Create a new attack based on this weapon
create-spell-attack-entry: Create a new attack based on this spell
create-dual-wield: Create dual wield attack using mainhand weapon and offhand weapon at right
critical-title: Штраф -3 ко всем атакам, испытаниям, проверкам навыков и характеристик, а также к КБ и уровню заклинателя
current-hp-title: Регулируемый игроком счётчик оставшихся пунктов здоровья
custom-category-desc: Категория, такая как школа магии или другое.
custom-crit-confirmation-bonus: Настраиваемый бонус к подтверждению критического удара для этой атаки
custom-url-title: Include a custom header image using the provided URL.
damage-dice-affected-by-size: Damage dice affected by size changes
damage-multiplier-title: Damage ability multiplier: .5, 1.5, 2, etc. Penalties are not multiplied.
damage-resistance-title: Снижение урона: количество игнорируемого урона и разновидность оружия, обходящего эту особенность (например, 5/серебро)
defense-notes-place: Оставьте примечания об обусловленных бонусах защиты
delete-ability-must-confirm-next-checkbo: WARNING: DELETE ALL Abilities, must confirm action using next checkbox
delete-all-old-rows-are-you-sure: WARNING: DELETE ALL buffs in old list, are you sure?
delete-all-rows-are-you-sure: WARNING: DELETE ALL rows, are you sure?
delete-attack-must-confirm-next-checkbox: WARNING: DELETE ALL Attacks, must confirm action using next checkbox
delete-buff-must-confirm-next-checkbox: WARNING: DELETE ALL Buffs, must confirm action using next checkbox
delete-class-feature: WARNING: DELETE ALL Orig Class Features
delete-class-feature-must-confirm-next-c: WARNING: DELETE ALL Orig Class Features, must confirm action using next checkbox
delete-feat-must-confirm-next-checkbox: WARNING: DELETE ALL Orig Feats, must confirm action using next checkbox
delete-item-must-confirm-next-checkbox: WARNING: DELETE ALL Items, must confirm action using next checkbox
delete-mythic-ability-must-confirm-next-: WARNING: DELETE ALL Mythic Abilities, must confirm action using next checkbox
delete-mythic-feat-must-confirm-next-che: WARNING: DELETE ALL Mythic Feats, must confirm action using next checkbox
delete-old-buff-list: WARNING: DELETE ALL buffs from the OLD list
delete-race-trait: WARNING: DELETE ALL Orig Racial Traits
delete-race-trait-must-confirm-next-chec: WARNING: DELETE ALL Orig Racial Traits, must confirm action using next checkbox
delete-spell-like-abilities: WARNING: DELETE ALL Orig Spell-like Abilities
delete-spell-like-abilities-must-confirm: WARNING: DELETE ALL Orig Spell-like Abilities, must confirm action using next checkbox
delete-spells-must-confirm-next-checkbox: WARNING: DELETE ALL Spells, must confirm action using next checkbox
delete-trait-must-confirm-next-checkbox: WARNING: DELETE ALL Orig Traits, must confirm action using next checkbox
dexterity-penalized-title: Dexterity Penalized. Penalties to ability scores only change the modifier, not the score itself. For every 2 points of damage or penalty you take to an ability, apply a –1 penalty to relevant skills and statistics.
difficulty-class-calculation-desc: 10 + Ability score modifier + DC basis level
difficulty-class-effect-basis-desc: Base for calculation of DC and effects, defaults to one half level / hit dice
disabled-title: Not unconscious until HP is under this value.
display-advanced-macros-title: Display Advanced fields to add to rolls. These will add to any 1d20 roll. Evaluated at roll-time, so queries may be used. Each requires '0' as default, and [[]] around rolls
display-advanced-options-title: Display extra fields for advanced customization, such as columns marked 'user defined'
display-both-whispers: Show both roll menu buttons for Monsters/NPCs
display-both-whispers-title: Display both sets of menu buttons at top of page: for PC-Whisper and NPC-Whisper
display-macro-text-title: Display macro fields for customizing roll template rolls
display-spells-known: Click this to display spells known column
do-not-touch: Do not use this section unless instructed to by sheet developers
domain-spells-explanation: On hybrid that use a mix of prepared and spontaneous spells, this allows the domain checkbox to be used to indicate spontaneous spells that are always available. Domain can be used for Mysteries, Spirit Magic, etc
dual-wield-instructions:
To setup dual wield, copy and paste the Row ID For Macros of the mainhand weapon and offhand weapon (found in IDs section of each attack row) in the fields below. Set mainhand and offhand penalties, and indicate if character has Improved Dual Wield then press Create at left.
If successful a new attack row appears and the two ID fields below will clear. If unsuccessful or attack IDs cannot be found they will not be cleared.
When penalties change or Imroved Dual Wield is gained, update here and press Update to update all existing dual wield entries.
You can only update Name or the iterative name, anything else will be overwritten. Note: DO NOT TOUCH THE ATTACK DROPDOWN
during-combat-place: List all combat tactics here, including spell, feat, and magic item use.
edit-mode-title: Переключить на расширенный режим (полное редактирование) или компактный режим (только важные поля).
edit-time-custom-num-attributes: Evaluate at edit time custom number attributes
effective-caster-level: Effective Caster/character Level: use for effects, if Sp then for caster level checks and concentration
effective-spell-level: Effective spell level: use for difficulty class and concentration checks
enable-pfs-desc: Sets hit points autocalc, prestige and fame points
enable-skill-check-query-title: Skill Checks will include an option to Roll, Take 10, or Take 20.
encumbered-title: Medium or heavy encumbrance penalties may limit speed and dexterity bonus to AC
encumbrance-above-title: Персонаж может поднять над головой массу, равную его максимальной нагрузке
encumbrance-drag-push-title: Персонаж обычно способен тянуть или толкать по земле массу, в пять раз превышеющую его максимальную нагрузку
encumbrance-heavy-title: От средней нагрузки и до этой массы персонаж тяжело нагружен. При такой или большей массе персонаж перегружен (теряет бонус ЛВК к КБ и может двигаться только на 5 фт. за ход (в качестве действия полного хода)).
encumbrance-light-title: При этой или меньшей носимой массе персонаж не нагружен
encumbrance-max-title: При этой или большей массе персонаж обездвижен
encumbrance-medium-title: От лёгкой нагрузки и до этой массы персонаж средне нагружен.
encumbrance-multiplier-title: The amount that load values will be multiplied
encumbrance-multiplier-total-title: Total amount that load values will be multiplied.
encumbrance-off-ground-title: Персонаж способен оторвать от земли массу, вдвое превышающую его максимальную нагрузку, но может только еле плестись с ней
encumbrance-size-multiplier-title: The amount that load values will be multiplied for size. Number of legs are accounted for.
encumbrance-str-bonus-title: Bonus to Strength score for carrying capacity only
enforce-requires-training: Неприменимые неизученные не появляются в списке?
ensure-macros-uptodate: Ensure macros are up to date.
equipped-title: Select which armor and shield are equipped.
error-delete-row: Error! You must delete this row before editing any items in this section.
error-msg1: Error! You must delete this row before editing any items in this section.
expand-multiclass: Expand to reveal more class rows
extra-damage-condition: Extra damage condition when dual wielding: Rake, Rend, etc
extraordinary-abilities-desc: Extraordinary abilities are nonmagical. They are, however, not something that just anyone can do or even learn to do without extensive training. Effects or areas that suppress or negate magic have no effect on extraordinary abilities.
footer-info: Created by Samuel Marino w/contributions by Vince, Chris Buchholz, Magik, James W. | Last updated:
footnote-macro-info-title: Types of macro-text fields used on the sheet.
footnote-a: (a) Evaluated at edit time. Must evaluate to number. No queries or rolls. Extended Expressions allowed. Must use ID number to refer to row value. Can refer to (a) expressions or number attributes only.
footnote-b: (b) Evaluated at roll time. May output string or number. Queries and rolls allowed. Must put [[brackets]] around rolls. Can refer to (a),(b),(c) expressions.
footnote-c: (c) Evaluated at roll time. Must evaluate to number. Queries and rolls allowed. [[Brackets]] automatically placed around expression. Can refer to (a) or (c) expressions or number attributes only (or (b) if it evaluates to a number).
footnote-d: (d) The actual roll. Sent to chat. Evaluated at roll time. Can refer to any of above.
frequency-title: Выберите, как часто можно применять способность
grazed-title: Штраф -1 ко всем атакам, испытаниям, проверкам навыков и характеристик, а также к КБ и уровню заклинателя
group-by-school-desc: Разбить заклинания по школам в меню заклинаний
group-name: Group by name for attackbook buttons
hd-not-bab: Использовать уровень/КЗ для ЗБМ вместо БМА
hd-not-bab-title: Если отмечено, то для ЗБМ используется число КЗ вместо БМА
head: Голова
header-image-default: Include the default header image on roll templates.(NOTE: setting can be overridden by Simple roll templates which do not display header images.)
header-image-none: Do not include a header image.
hit-points-ability-title: The Ability Score that contributes a bonus/penalty to the overall character hit points by level.
hit-points-adjustment-title: Player configurable adjustment to maximum hit points by way of a formula.
hit-points-due-to-hit-dice-title: Hit points due to class levels and hit dice
hit-points-modifier-2-title: The value produced by the HP adj2 formula.
hit-points-modifier-title: The modifier that comes from the Ability Score chosen to adjust hit points per level.
immunities-title: Не наносится урон от указанных источников (напр., кислота, огонь, паралич)
improved-title: Improved Dual Wield: check here if offhand attack gains iteratives
in-special-abilities-section: In list under Special Abilities below
include-attack-notes: Включить примечания или изображения при бросках атаки? Примечания и изображения будут привязаны к типу атаки.
include-information-title: Include these additional attributes with saving throws?
include-spell-info: Включить эти параметры в каждый бросок заклинания?
initiative-notes-title: Включить примечание к инициативе в бросок
instru-a-0: New sheets begin on the Configuration page. Use the Settings button(config-show) to edit the sheet.
instru-a-1: Checkboxes with a label cause the section with same name (h2 or h3 header) to be revealed or hidden.
instru-a-2: Screenreader users please turn on reading of Title attributes. A lot of information is still in the titles.
instru-a-3: Screenreader users should check expand all to ensure all content is visible to the reader. It is the second checkbox on this page.
intelligence-penalized-title: Intelligence Penalized. Penalties to ability scores only change the modifier, not the score itself. For every 2 points of damage or penalty you take to an ability, apply a –1 penalty to relevant skills and statistics.
is-mythic: Check if this row is Mythic
is-npc-description: Sheet is an NPC or Monster
iterative-attacks-title: Add additional attacks for this weapon.
kinetic-blast-attack-damage-macros: Kinetic Blast attack and damage macros
legs-title: Количество ног персонажа. Влияет на грузоподъёмность. Отметьте, если нужно рассчитывать грузоподъёмность как для четырёхногого существа.
link-hit-points-npc-to-pc: Editing NPC HP updates PC HP
link-hit-points-title: Syncs @{NPC-HP} to @{HP} if using @{HP} for npc/monster hit points.
macro-recalc-instructions: If you are having problems with list or skill macros, uncheck the appropriate box below and hit the recalc button.
manual-recalc-for-high-cr: Check to manually hit recalc after parse is complete (Recommended for high CR creatures with many abilities)
max-hp-title: Автоматически рассчитывается с учётом ПЗ классов, ПЗ за предпочитаемые классы (см. таблицу классов), бонусов/штрафов характеристик и уровня, прочих модификаторов, вытягивания жизни и ПЗ Мифических Приключений (если включено).
maximum-damage-ability-title: Maximum damage ability applied (for strength score, etc.)
maximum-dexterity-title: Максимальный бонус ЛВК к КБ, ограниченный бронёй или нагрузкой
melee-attack-notes-place: Оставьте примечания об обусловленных бонусах к ближним атакам
mental-modifiers-total: Total of all 3 mental ability modifiers
merge-buffs: Copy old buffs list into new buffs list
merge-class-features: Merge Orig Class Features into Abilities
merge-race-traits: Merge Orig Racial Traits into Abilities
merge-slas: Merge Orig Spell-like Abilities into Abilities
metamagic-title: Нажмите для отображения поля ячейки заклинания, ятобы отличить ячейку от круга заклинания
monster-or-non-player-character: Sheet represents a Monster or NPC
morale-place: List here under what condition the creature flees combat, if any.
mythic-bonus-hit-points-title: Bonus hit points that are gained from each tier advancement: archmage: 3, champion: 5, guardian: 5, hierophant: 4, marshal: 4, or trickster: 4
mythic-hero-power: Mythic Hero Information and Mythic Power
mythic-hit-points-title: Bonus HP x Tier. This is automatically added to Max HP
mythic-path-title: Mythic Path: archmage, champion, guardian, hierophant, marshal, or trickster
mythic-power-avail-title: How much mythic power you have available to use
mythic-power-max-title: The maximum amount of mythic power you have
mythic-power-miscellaneous-title: Any additional mythic power you gain from abilities or feats
mythic-power-tiers-title: The amount of mythic power you gain from tiers
mythic-tier-title: Mythic tier or rank. Mythic tiers range from 1 to 10
name: Название
nav-main-desc: Main menubar follows this element (it is not inside the menubar element). Menuitem 'all' displays all sections.
negative-number: Use a negative number to indicate the penalty
non-proficient-armor-title: Применение штрафа за доспехи от брони (и/или щита) к атакам так же как ко всем проверкам навыков и характеристик, основанных на Силе и Ловкости.
nonlethal-damage-title: Player adjustable tracking of non-lethal damage. Character is staggered if nonlethal damage >= current hp, field will outline in yellow.
npc-ac-compendium-place: Format: AC nn, touch nn, flat-footed nn (+n DEX, +n natural, +n size, +n dodge)
npc-senses-compendium-place: Format: blindsense 20 ft., low-light vision; Perception + 20
npc-special-attacks-place: List all special combat actions here, in alphabetical order. Do not list feats.
npc-statblock-parse-instructions: Drag a monster from the compendium here, or type in the statblock values below. Then hit the parse button. The parser will populate the sheet with the underlying stats and attacks.
npc-statblock-textarea-instructions: For multiline textareas, paste in exactly as appears in source. Keep newlines in input.
number-extra-attacks-title: Number of offhand attacks: 1 for Two Weapon Fighting, 2 = Improved, 3 = Greater
number-fill-in-skills-show: Число отображаемых навыков ремесла, профессий и исполнения:
number-prepared-title: Indicates the number of prepared spells remaining.
number-used-title: Indicates the number of times a spell has been cast today.
offhand-damage-multiplier: Offhand strength(or whatever ability is used for damage of an offhand attack) damage multiplier. ie 1/2 default, 1 for Double Slice
options-attacks-accessible-title: Use simple accessible template for attacks.
options-attacks-include-link-abilities: When creating an Ability-based attack, include a link to the ability in the weapon notes.
options-attacks-include-link-spells: When creating a Spell-based attack, include a link to the spell in the weapon notes.
options-spell-accessible-title: Use simple accessible template for spells
options-use-metrics-title: Show auto-calculated totals for weight and distance as metric. This option DOES NOT convert user input for weight and distance. Ensure you have entered metric-based values.
other-currency-title: Число монет, не носимых персонажем в данный момент
other-spells-per-day-title: If Spells/Day represents prepared spells, use this to set total Spontaneous Spells/Day. Or vice-versa
over-heavy-encumbrance-title: Персонаж способен оторвать от земли массу, вдвое превышающую его максимальную нагрузку, но может только еле плестись с ней
overloaded-title: While overloaded in this way, the character loses any Dexterity bonus to AC and can move only 5 feet per round (as a full-round action).
precision-damage-title: Дополнительный урон или урон за точность (не прибавляется к критическому урону)
prepared-spells-explanation: On prepared casters, spells with a positive number in uses are considered 'prepared', uses represents the number of times memorized and usable that are left.
psionic-ability-title: The psionic class key ability modifier source.
psionic-manifester-level-and-power-point: Psionic Manifester Level and Power Points
psionic-manifester-lvls-title: The sum of the levels of psionic classes that have a key ability score selected on the right.
psionic-manifester-miscellaneous-title: Any miscellaneous modifiers to the manifester level.
psionic-power-points-available-title: How many power points you have available to use.
psionic-power-points-bonus-title: The amount of bonus power points you gain from manifester level and key ability modifier.
psionic-power-points-class-title: The amount of base bonus power points you gain from you class(es).
psionic-power-points-miscellaneous-title: Any additional power points you gain from race, traits or feats.
psionic-power-points-reserve-title: Your power point reserve is equal to your base power points gained from your class, bonus power points from a high key ability score, and any additional bonus power points from sources such as your character race and feat selections.
range-per-level-desc: Число (для "За уровень" или "Число"), или особое описание дистанции ("линия" или "конус")
ranged-attack-notes-place: Оставьте примечания об обусловленных бонусах к дистанционным атакам
recalculate-hit-points: Пересчитать ПЗ и сбросить до максимума
recalculate-hit-points-title: Пересчитать ПЗ и врем. ПЗ и установить текущие ПЗ на максимум
resistances-title: Ignores some damage of the indicated type each time it takes damage of that kind. (e.g. acid 10)
roll-time-custom-attributes: Evaluate at roll time custom attributes
roll-time-custom-num-attributes: Evaluate at roll time custom number attributes
row-id-desc: Row ID for macros under ID section of the row. Does not appear in compact Mode.
sanity-save-custom-modifier: Custom Will save mod for save vs sanity effects
save-notes-place: Оставьте примечания об обусловленных бонусах к испытаниям
scroll-desc-title: Scroll long descriptions in roll templates.
set-as-armor: Set armor values using this row
set-as-shield: Set shield values using this row
set-sheet-color: Set sheet color to rolltemplate color
sheets-created-after-v1: Sheet created at version 100 or later
sheets-guide: KNOWN ISSUES / Wiki HOW TO Guide
show-all-conditions-desc: Показать состояния, на оказывающие влияния на числовые параметры бланка.
show-arcane-reservoir-title: Show Arcane Reservoir in spell point field
show-in-menu-title: Нажмите, чтобы в соответствующем командном меню отображалась кнопка для этой строки.
show-old-announcements: Check to reveal Old Announcements section
show-onetime-columns-title: Show feat, race, trait, and class and requires training columns.
show-onetime-item-fields-title: Show item equipment type, hardness, item-hp, item-hp|max, and value.
show-phrenic-spellpoint-pool: Show Spell Points for Phrenic Pool or Mesmerist Tricks
show-phrenic-spellpoint-pool-title: Show Phrenic Pool or Mesmerist Tricks in spell point field
show-skills: Expand to show more custom skills
show-spellpoint-arcane-reservoir: Show Spell Points for Arcane Reservoir
show-uses-spell-desc: Показать # заклинаний, использованных за день, в меню заклинаний
skill-notes-place: Оставьте примечания об обусловленных бонусах к навыкам
skill-size-title: Size adjustment for skills. Double for stealth
skills-per-hit-die: Пункты навыков за кость здоровья от народа
source-ability-title: ID of the ability from the abilities tab that, when changed, updates this attack entry
source-attack-title: ID of the attack from the Attacks list that, when changed, updates this attack entry
source-item-title: ID of the Item from the Inventory tab that, when changed, updates this attack entry
source-spell-title: ID of the Spell from the Spell tab that, when changed, updates this attack entry
source-title: Source of ability - class or race
special-abilities-and-content-place: Format: Special Abilities (newline) Ability Name (Ex): ability description (newline) description of monster
special-qualities-place: Add all special qualities here, listed alphabetically
speed-multiplier-title: Run Multiplier; (×4) if light, medium, or no armor. (×3) if heavy armor.
speed-run-title: Максимальная дистанция, которую может пробежать персонаж по прямой в течение хода
spell-penetration-bonus-label: Бонус к проверке УЗ от преодолевающей магии
spell-resistance-title: Устойчивость к магии: отменяет эффекты заклинаний и псевдозаклинаний, воздействующих на неё. Проверка уровня заклинателя против УкМ позволяет преодолеть защиту.
spellbook-only-prepared-spells: Показывать только подготовленные заклинания в меню
spellclass-level-base: Spellclass level, concentration, and base stats
spells-migrated-title: Spells migrated If you have not deleted original spells you can remigrate To remigrate, WARNING: DELETE ALL spells on spells tab and uncheck, then press refresh
statistics-rolls-title: Defense stats and other future stat blocks
strength-penalized-title: Strength Penalized. Penalties to ability scores only change the modifier, not the score itself. For every 2 points of damage or penalty you take to an ability, apply a –1 penalty to relevant skills and statistics.
sum-uses-from-spells: Sum of 'Uses' fields in spell rows
temporary-hit-points-buff-title: Temporary hit points that come from active Buffs (see Core tab).
temporary-hit-points-maximum-title: Temporary hit points max if using as secondary pool.
temporary-hit-points-miscellaneous-title: Player configurable temporary hit points that add to the total Temp HP value.
title: Титул/Прозвище
toggle-buff: When checked, this buff is active and will count towards the totals, which will then affect the rest of the sheet. Also, only the visible/selected buffs will count towards the totals.
toggle-horror-adventures-long: Display/Enable Horror Adventures Character Sheet Items
toggle-mythic-adventures: Display/Enable Mythic Adventures Character Sheet Items
uncanny-dodge-desc: Не терять ЛВК, когда застигнут врасплох
uncanny-dodge-title: If checked, AC will not auto adjust when a condition is checked that causes loss of DEX to AC, except for immobilizing conditions.
undead-title: Creature is undead, uses Charisma for hit points, abilities, skills instead of Constitution
unlock-defense-dropdowns: Разрешить использовать разные характеристики для КБ и МБМ
unlock-defense-dropdowns-title: If checked, CMD could use different ability in 2nd dropdown than AC uses. For instance, DEX for AC and INT for CMD, instead of DEX or WIS for both.
update-hp-when-max-changes: Обновлять текущ. ПЗ, когда меняется макс. ПЗ
update-hp-when-max-changes-title: Когда меняется максимальное число ПЗ, меняет текущие ПЗ на то же число
update-to-latest: Update all sheets to latest version
update-weapons: Update dual wield attacks with new penalties or improved state
use-buff-bonus-stacking: Use buff bonus types and stacking
use-dwarf-encumbrance-title: Use Dwarf encumbrance rules: base speed not lowered due to load or armor encumbrance
use-round-corners-on-simple-templates: Round Corners on non simple template.
use-simple-templates: Use Simple Templates (Spells and Attacks set seperately)
vision-title: @{vision} Сумеречное зрение (видение вдвое дальше обычного при низком освещении), ночное зрение (видение совсем без источников освещения), и т.д.
weaknesses-title: Adverse conditions may apply if applicable. (e.g. sunlight powerlessness/staggered)
whisper-character-rolls: PC rolls: Whisper to GM or broadcast publicly
whisper-non-player-character-rolls: NPC rolls: Whisper to GM or broadcast publicly
whisper-rolls-title: Whisper to GM or broadcast publicly
wisdom-penalized-title: Wisdom Penalized. Penalties to ability scores only change the modifier, not the score itself. For every 2 points of damage or penalty you take to an ability, apply a –1 penalty to relevant skills and statistics.
worn-equipment-hp-max-title: The maximum possible hit points of the item
worn-equipment-quantity-title: If the item has charges, this is how many remain
worn-equipment-short-desc-title: Краткое описание предмета, может включать в себя макротекст, отображаемый в чате
worn-equipment-slot-title: The location on the body where the equipment is worn
wounded-title: Штраф -2 ко всем атакам, испытаниям, проверкам навыков и характеристик, а также к КБ и уровню заклинателя
